TEXT.S:
Alan Anderson
siwkay niza Alan Anderson (10 a bulad 16 a demiad, 1982 a mihcan), Alan Anderson, miunduay.
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika Â·NBA Alan Jeffery Anderson is an American professional basketball who last played for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu
